title: A new default web stack
summary: When building a new web application, the default set of tools used to be a web framework such as Django and a relational database such as PostgreSQL. In 2014, these tools are no longer enough. In this talk, I'll present a new default stack to help build applications that are faster, more robust, easy to scale and still support rapid iteration and fast feature development.
